import React ,{useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import * as TiIcons from 'react-icons/ti'; import * as AiIcons from 'react-icons/ai'; import {SidebarData} from "./SidebarData"; import {IconContext} from "react-icons"; import "./Navbar.css" function Navbar() { const [sidebar,setSidebar]=useState(false) const showSidebar= ()=>{setSidebar(!sidebar)} return (
this.menuButtonClick(e, menuClickCount, containerClassnames) } > this.mobileMenuButtonClick(e, containerClassnames)} >
this.handleSearchInputChange(e)} onKeyPress={e => this.handleSearchInputKeyPress(e)} /> this.handleSearchIconClick(e)} >
{locale.toUpperCase()} {localeOptions.map(l => { return ( this.handleChangeLocale(l.id, l.direction)} key={l.id} > {l.name} ); })}
{isDarkSwitchActive && }
Sarah Kortney Account Features History Support this.handleLogout()}> Sign out
); } export default Navbar
